channel.title: Broken "Download" image
channel.description: In [url]https://www.blackmesasource.com/download.html[/url] there's a broken link to an image. The link shows as [code] [/code] It doesn't show properly - unless you're hosting a black mesa mirror on your machine, I guess :slight_smile: EDIT: sorry, please delete. it's a dup of the (still not fixed) [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12644[/url]

item.title: Broken "Download" image
item.dc:creator: Skitch
item.description:
In https://www.blackmesasource.com/download.html there’s a broken link to an image.

The link shows as <img src="https://localhost/blackmesa/img/dl-header.png" width="208" height="21">

It doesn’t show properly - unless you’re hosting a black mesa mirror on your machine, I guess

EDIT: sorry, please delete. it’s a dup of the (still not fixed) https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12644

Read full topic
